name: Telegram
natural_language_description: 这是 Telegram 节点。主要用于: Sends data to Telegram

preBuiltAgentsCalloutTelegram.displayName: Interact with Telegram using our pre-built
preBuiltAgentsCalloutTelegram.name: preBuiltAgentsCalloutTelegram
preBuiltAgentsCalloutTelegram.natural_language_description: 参数名: Interact with Telegram using our pre-built

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message
available_options: Chat (值: chat)
Callback (值: callback)
File (值: file)
Message (值: message)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: sendMessage
available_options: Delete Chat Message (值: deleteMessage) - Delete a chat message
Edit Message Text (值: editMessageText) - Edit a text message
Pin Chat Message (值: pinChatMessage) - Pin a chat message
Send Animation (值: sendAnimation) - Send an animated file
Send Audio (值: sendAudio) - Send a audio file
Send Chat Action (值: sendChatAction) - Send a chat action
Send Document (值: sendDocument) - Send a document
Send Location (值: sendLocation) - Send a location
Send Media Group (值: sendMediaGroup) - Send group of photos or videos to album
Send Message (值: sendMessage) - Send a text message
Send and Wait for Response (值: sendAndWait) - Send a message and wait for response
Send Photo (值: sendPhoto) - Send a photo
Send Sticker (值: sendSticker) - Send a sticker
Send Video (值: sendVideo) - Send a video
Unpin Chat Message (值: unpinChatMessage) - Unpin a chat message

chatId.name: chatId
chatId.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername). To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot.
chatId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Chat ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername). To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot. | (必填项)

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.description: Unique identifier of the message to edit
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | 作用: Unique identifier of the message to edit | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: appendAttribution (值: None) - Whether to include the phrase “This message was sent automatically with n8n” to the end of the message
caption (值: None) - Caption text to set, 0-1024 characters
disable_notification (值: None) - Whether to send the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
disable_web_page_preview (值: None) - Whether to disable link previews for links in this message
duration (值: None) - Duration of clip in seconds
fileName (值: None)
height (值: None) - Height of the video
parse_mode (值: None) - How to parse the text
performer (值: None) - Name of the performer
reply_to_message_id (值: None) - If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
message_thread_id (值: None) - The unique identifier of the forum topic
title (值: None) - Title of the track

thumb (值: None) - Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail‘s width and height should not exceed 320.
width (值: None) - Width of the video

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Unique identifier of the target user
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: Unique identifier of the target user | (必填项)

description.name: description
description.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: New chat description, 0-255 characters | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: New chat title, 1-255 characters | (必填项)

queryId.name: queryId
queryId.description: Unique identifier for the answered query
queryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the answered query | (必填项)

results.name: results
results.description: A JSON-serialized array of results for the inline query
results.natural_language_description: 参数名: Results | 作用: A JSON-serialized array of results for the inline query | (必填项)

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File ID | 作用: The ID of the file | (必填项)

download.name: download
download.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download | 作用: Whether to download the file | 默认值: True

messageType.name: messageType
messageType.description: The type of the message to edit
messageType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Type | 作用: The type of the message to edit | 默认值: message
available_options: Inline Message (值: inlineMessage)
Message (值: message)

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 作用: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

inlineMessageId.name: inlineMessageId
inlineMessageId.description: Unique identifier of the inline message to edit
inlineMessageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inline Message ID | 作用: Unique identifier of the inline message to edit | (必填项)

replyMarkup.name: replyMarkup
replyMarkup.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reply Markup | 作用: Additional interface options | 默认值: none
available_options: Force Reply (值: forceReply)
Inline Keyboard (值: inlineKeyboard)
None (值: none)
Reply Keyboard (值: replyKeyboard)
Reply Keyboard Remove (值: replyKeyboardRemove)

file.name: file
file.description: Video file to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.
file.natural_language_description: 参数名: Video | 作用: Video file to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

action.name: action
action.description: Type of action to broadcast. Choose one, depending on what the user is about to receive. The status is set for 5 seconds or less (when a message arrives from your bot).
action.natural_language_description: 参数名: Action | 作用: Type of action to broadcast. Choose one, depending on what the user is about to receive. The status is set for 5 seconds or less (when a message arrives from your bot). | 默认值: typing
available_options: Find Location (值: find_location)
Record Audio (值: record_audio)
Record Video (值: record_video)
Record Video Note (值: record_video_note)
Typing (值: typing)
Upload Audio (值: upload_audio)
Upload Document (值: upload_document)
Upload Photo (值: upload_photo)
Upload Video (值: upload_video)
Upload Video Note (值: upload_video_note)

latitude.name: latitude
latitude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Latitude | 作用: Location latitude | 默认值: 0

longitude.name: longitude
longitude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Longitude | 作用: Location longitude | 默认值: 0

media.name: media
media.natural_language_description: 参数名: Media | 作用: The media to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: media (值: None)

text.name: text
text.description: Text of the message to be sent
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: Text of the message to be sent | (必填项)

forceReply.name: forceReply
forceReply.natural_language_description: 参数名: Force Reply | 默认值: {}
available_options: force_reply (值: None) - Whether to show reply interface to the user, as if they manually selected the bot‘s message and tapped ’Reply
selective (值: None) - Whether to force reply from specific users only

inlineKeyboard.name: inlineKeyboard
inlineKeyboard.description: Adds an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to
inlineKeyboard.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inline Keyboard | 作用: Adds an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to | 默认值: {}
available_options: rows (值: None)

replyKeyboard.name: replyKeyboard
replyKeyboard.description: Adds a custom keyboard with reply options
replyKeyboard.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reply Keyboard | 作用: Adds a custom keyboard with reply options | 默认值: {}
available_options: rows (值: None)

replyKeyboardOptions.name: replyKeyboardOptions
replyKeyboardOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reply Keyboard Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: resize_keyboard (值: None) - Whether to request clients to resize the keyboard vertically for optimal fit
one_time_keyboard (值: None) - Whether to request clients to hide the keyboard as soon as it's been used
selective (值: None) - Whether to show the keyboard to specific users only

replyKeyboardRemove.name: replyKeyboardRemove
replyKeyboardRemove.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reply Keyboard Remove | 默认值: {}
available_options: remove_keyboard (值: None) - Whether to request clients to remove the custom keyboard
selective (值: None) - Whether to force reply from specific users only

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Type | 默认值: approval
available_options: Approval (值: approval) - User can approve/disapprove from within the message
Free Text (值: freeText) - User can submit a response via a form
Custom Form (值: customForm) - User can submit a response via a custom form

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields
available_options: Using Fields Below (值: fields)
Using JSON (值: json)

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Approval Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: messageButtonLabel (值: None)
responseFormTitle (值: None) - Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response
responseFormDescription (值: None) - Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response
responseFormButtonLabel (值: None)
responseFormCustomCss (值: None) - Override default styling of the response form with CSS
limitWaitTime (值: None) - Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type
appendAttribution (值: None) - Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message
